description: Try our easy to follow Mango, Banana, Oatmeal & Almond Breakfast Smoothie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mango, Banana, Oatmeal & Almond Breakfast Smoothie
name: Mango, Banana, Oatmeal & Almond Breakfast Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, place 100g mango flesh, 1 peeled banana, 40g natural almonds, 1 tbs rolled oats, 1 pinch ground cinnamon, 1 tbs rice malt syrup or honey and 2/3 cup macadamia milk. Blend until smooth, then pour into two glasses. Serve.
